website_summaries.verdict: The best dinnerware set available. Attractive, durable, china at a very reasonable price.
pros: Great price for an everyday set of china
A bit too whimsical for formal use, but great for all other occasions
cons: Not for those looking for formal china

customer_reviews.title: Not AUTHENTIC
customer_reviews.text: This is 5th review I am posting bc all my review has been rejected for no reason. Just wanted to warn you this 12 piece set is not authentic. I have returned and got an other set and it was not authentic as well. I was only able to compare bc I already had an original set.
customer_reviews.author: Twinkle228

customer_reviews.title: False advertising!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 18 pc dinnerware Lenox Butterfly Meadow thinking that i'm buying exactly what the picture show. NO! I got the 18 pc dinnerware in side the colorful Butterfly Meadow a plain white 18 pc dinnerware with embossed butterfly which I took a photo below. I want to return it but I'm too weak right now to put all the stuff back in the box. I'm so disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Dishes!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Prior to purchasing, I read excellent feedback with the exception of one person that stated that when serving food that needed a knife (i.e. steak)that the plates got all scratched. I served steak with steak knives and these dishes were just fine. Not one scratch. I absolutely love them and just getting out a plate from the cupboard brings a smile to my face; the dishes are that pretty! If you are on the fence about ordering - go for it. You won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Ilene Hassan

customer_reviews.title: So easy to replace/add any piece from a variety of "Butterfly ...
customer_reviews.text: GORGEOUS for everyday use. This particular set has EVERYTHING: 4 complete settings with 7 pieces! What a bargain for so many pieces. So easy to replace/add any piece from a variety of "Butterfly Meadow". All the patterns work together. If you are on the fence about purchasing it - do not hesitate - an EXCELLENT purchase! And you get Lenox's Replacement Garantee. Thank you SO much, Lenox, for the perfect dinnerware.
customer_reviews.author: PC Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful set. Just love it, I have many dinning sets, but I have to say this one is by far my favorite😍💕 I totally recommend it 👌👌👌
customer_reviews.author: Annie R

customer_reviews.title: Patterns are not like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Patterns are not like the picture, they are lighter, while in the picture they seem hot. Doesn't worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Mall Lover

customer_reviews.title: The special price we paid during the summer makes this a lovely shopping bargain.
customer_reviews.text: This set of Lenox dishware is even nicer than the pictures can show. The weight, lustre, and shape of the plantes and bowls are excellent. We use the smaller dishes for breakfast and lunch. The dinner plates are sufficiently deep so liquids do not drip off.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C. Dare

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy with Size
customer_reviews.text: I have got them on sale. i got excited when i saw them on sale for 13 and ot 2. These are not big plates, might be a snack size. Make sure you check the size dimensions carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Ramchand Muppalla

customer_reviews.title: The set is in good quality. Expect that sometimes it is too hot ...
customer_reviews.text: The set is in good quality. Expect that sometimes it is too hot to hold the bowls when it contains hot soup.
customer_reviews.author: Jun Zhu

customer_reviews.title: I have the prettiest china ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have the prettiest china ever. These replaced my Corelle dishes that I have had for over 20 years. I don't like heavy, bulky dishes. If you like Corelle, you will LOVE this china. It's so similar, but so beautiful. I couldn't be more pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gayla Lutzke

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic colors/patterns...
customer_reviews.text: I kept the set , because returning is so much hassel... definitely not authentic!!! This set is not near at all Comparing to the Macy's meadow butterfly set vibrant colors ... it's a fake big time... no wonder was cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Alma xhepaj

customer_reviews.title: Above and beyond my expectations
customer_reviews.text: It is so charming and I love the meadow theme! I've always wanted elegance in my kitchen and this is it. Lenox for life because I am a collector now! The entire set was packaged to perfection as it shipped, without incident, all the way to Guam. Customized boxes, inside of medium box, with a larger protective box for shipping! I was really worried about shipping but Lenox knows what they are doing! Excellent work!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Bea

customer_reviews.title: Everyday Magic!
customer_reviews.text: Keeping only the things that I LOVE around me, has been my new motto. This Lenox set fits the bill with it's unexpected whimsy in the patterns on each piece. The quality is excellent in that it is durable, relatively lightweight, and can be used in the microwave and dishwasher, makes this my most favored dish set ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! I am in love!
customer_reviews.text: I had this set in my cart for months. I finally purchased and received my set. I love all of the detail in each peice. Ablsoultey love the bumble bees, ladybugs, butterflies and assortment of flowers! If you are in the market for new dishes, you will not be disappointed with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: April Boh

customer_reviews.title: These are the best
customer_reviews.text: Of all the Butterfly Meadow's plates--I like these the best. They are beautiful and I will use them as regular plates. Their size is more suitable to today's smaller portions and with a side salad dish, it sets a nice table. I have three of them (soon to be 4) and all are the same pattern as shown in the picture. Would be nice to have different patterns, but I guess nobody thought one might use them as dinner plates!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: It's so pretty and is high quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the size, feel and look of these. I bought these to complement my existing set to use instead of my dinner plates, which I found too big. I felt like I was eating off a charger. These fit the bill, perfect size for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Wright

customer_reviews.title: very pretty
customer_reviews.text: pretty dinnerware,I just want to say it's worth it!!Very pretty!
customer_reviews.author: dbwindy

customer_reviews.title: Lenox is beautiful. This size is great for smaller amounts of ...
customer_reviews.text: Again, Lenox is beautiful. This size is great for smaller amounts of food for the dinner table. This and one bigger are standing up completely to the dishwasher, which was a concern. I have even put them on the bottom rack and not a glimmer of a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dinnerware sets ! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Heard about this brand with their beautiful, elegant design instead of plain white sets, I decided to buy these 28 pieces dinnerware sets for our new house and I love them at the first sight. Each has 4 pieces total. They are light weight but good quality. I got lots of compliments from my family and friends so I am glad I invested money in this set. Fast shipping and well packaged. Lenox also has a program to replace at 50% of the cost if the items are damaged or defective, which is great also! I highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: I have the prettiest china ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have the prettiest china ever. These replaced my Corelle dishes that I have had for over 20 years. I don't like heavy, bulky dishes. If you like Corelle, you will LOVE this china. It's so similar, but so beautiful. I couldn't be more pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gayla Lutzke

customer_reviews.title: The size bowl we use the most
customer_reviews.text: We use this size bowl more than any other. We use it for soups, chinese food, cereal, oatmeal, stews. We also have the pasta bowls (great for salads as well as pasta and several things) and the dessert bowls (good for salsa and beans). But we always seem to come back to this size most of the time. I'm ordering more because we get in a panic when all our bowls are in the dishwasher and we have run out! We have an extensive set of Butterfly Meadow china. So far all the items shipped to us from Amazon have come well wrapped in bubble wrap and have been in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: A On Wheels

customer_reviews.title: Scalloped edges.
customer_reviews.text: The bowls came with no Lenox box only wrapped with bubble wrap sitting in the shipping box with my other bowls.👎 They measure 4 1/2 inches wide, 2 1/2 inches deep. These are not cheap plastic, china-made in China👎.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry W.

customer_reviews.title: It’s sturdy, pretty and yet practical.
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty, and I like the scalloped edges. They curl up so ur food stays on ur plate. And having different patterns on some of them makes it fun for the young ppl to pick their “special “ piece.
customer_reviews.author: Norma L. Priddy

customer_reviews.title: I loved it. I have bought many things from lenox
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. I have bought many things from lenox. Incredible price as well. Worth the money. I love the design.
customer_reviews.author: yanet

customer_reviews.title: Received broken bowls
customer_reviews.text: The bowl came out broken and the refund product is asking me to return the item. What do I return here???
customer_reviews.author: Neha Khan

customer_reviews.title: Blah
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a housewarming gift. After all, you can't really go wrong with Lenox. It arrived today. When I opened it, I was somewhat disheartened to see the plate covered in bubble wrap- minus the Lenox box. Also, the color is not as brilliant as I expected. There is nothing outstanding about this accent plate, especially considering the price. I'm very disappointed in both the product and the packaging..
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl H.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Added two to my Butterfly Meadows set. Now I have dragonfly's with my butterfly's!
customer_reviews.author: DStiefer

customer_reviews.title: great plates
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these as party plates and as bread and butter plates. They are great for those purposes and as small side salad plates. Very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dishes. Want more
customer_reviews.text: I decided to just buy the small butterfly Lenox plates because I've never owned any. They are so pretty and they go beautifully with all my other plates. Maybe in the future I'll get more. But for now I'm so pleased with these. They actually were prettier than I thought they would be.
customer_reviews.author: Tulsi Anne Rose

customer_reviews.title: as pretty in in the pictures
customer_reviews.text: Nice everyday dishes. Haven't owned long enough to evaluate durability. I purchased matching melamine bowls separately (for some reason, we tend to break bowls).
customer_reviews.author: P. duMont

customer_reviews.title: Made my mom happy!
customer_reviews.text: My mom has the plate set 10 years ago! She wished bought the bowl set too but she couldn't find them anymore. Glad I thought to check amazon and my mom is now so grateful! She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Xoxo_Christlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Dishes
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend of ours. My wife really likes the Lennox Butterfly Meadows dishes and purchased them for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ruberg

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful Set of Dishes!
customer_reviews.text: I am so very pleased and thrilled with Butterfly Meadow dish set! It was well worth it to save my pennies and dimes to order this. I can't wait to start ordering other pieces of this set.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Anne Harkins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and durable.
customer_reviews.text: I really love these. I have admired them for years for the colors and patterns. I like that I can use them for everyday. Because I am in my late 70's these will be my everyday dishs.
customer_reviews.author: Current user

customer_reviews.title: Lenox bowl
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful and delicate bowl which looks beautiful sitting on a living room end table. I have had several compliments.
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: My mom loved these! I'm helping her build up her China ...
customer_reviews.text: My mom loved these! I'm helping her build up her China collection and she also likes butterflies. These were her Christmas gifts along with two other Lenox pieces from the same collection.
customer_reviews.author: Malissa I.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dishes
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered basically an 8 person serving w/most extra accessories. Today I recv'd the final pcs I needed. I bought the 18 pc set to finish & extras. Two of the 12oz mugs were shattered. Checked the return policy & would have had to pay p&h to return the whole set instead of just the 2 broken pcs. I found it easier & cheaper to just buy 2 replacement mugs. kind of disappointing as I buy quite a bit on Amazon. Beside this issue, very pleased with Lenox set.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lenox Dinnerware Set!
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted Lenox for a while! After finding the set on Amazon at a great price I went for it! It's beautiful! No issues with the quality or color, or pattern. Just as pictured. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: love2read

customer_reviews.title: Superior Quality, Value Priced
customer_reviews.text: These dishes are beautiful and exceeded my expectations. I bought two to equal 12 place settings. Within each set each dish and cup has a different pattern on it. I've already put them through the wash and can't wait to use them for supper. I like them so well I intend to collect the rest of the pieces in the entire set.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Petrig

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a much larger bowl. This is a one serving size for a fruit salad!
customer_reviews.author: Marly

customer_reviews.title: As pictured
customer_reviews.text: As described and in the picture If you’re looking at these, you probably already have this design. These replaced some that were lost to poor hands...
customer_reviews.author: OL

customer_reviews.title: Lennex Butterfly Meadow Dishes
customer_reviews.text: The butterfly meadow dish's are great and designed with a beautiful pattern. This bowl is a nice size.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ruberg

customer_reviews.title: Easy replacement for my favorite china
customer_reviews.text: So happy I was able to replace this bowl at Amazon. I have this set of dinnerware and found one bowl was cracked. Thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Texas Grandmommy

customer_reviews.title: Light, clean, and beauiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful products! Very light to use, easy washing, absolutely beautiful! Fast delivery, and well packed, not even scratched. Useful to use any purpose. I love this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bora

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Though I love this pattern, there were some of the dinner plates and salad plates that seemed very faded in comparison to the other set I purchased at Belks.
customer_reviews.author: Vanillasun

customer_reviews.title: In love with Lenox
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about durability, since I am using it recently. I am in love with the product! I got almost whole set! Mugs, plates and this one was 3 different sizes of soup dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Gulnar Rahman

customer_reviews.title: Great for small snacks and desserts
customer_reviews.text: These plates are so pretty, yet smaller than I thought they were going to be. Great for small desserts and snacks, though!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Lenox
customer_reviews.text: The plates arrived in a box but was disappointed to see how small it actually is.
customer_reviews.author: drea garcia

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: This is how my bowl was delivered today. Now I have to find the time to return it so that they can replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan

customer_reviews.title: I love the size and will re-order more once the "holiday ...
customer_reviews.text: I added 2 of these to my larger order and was shocked to open the box and find they had just been added to box without any wrapping or protection. They did arrive ok no chips or cracks thank goodness. I love the size and will re-order more once the "holiday shipping season" is over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just so beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the feeling of cottage garden...love them! And cups are big enough (nearly) to be mugs! Like that too. But mostly it is the art work and different on all the pieces. Charming and very very beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: marcia m hildreth

customer_reviews.title: unhappy
customer_reviews.text: still am not happy that i paid 14.00 for one bowl. it is worded as 6 bowls. i wanted to return it but i had to pay 6.00. the bowl was very pretty but 14.00????!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: celeste tranford

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent as expected. Well packaged. Made sure that it is coming from Amazon and not third-party.
customer_reviews.author: Very Simple TRUE Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this bowl. The flowers and butterflies are perfect. The white is perfect. There were no chips or scratches. It's about the size of a cereal bowl so it's good for candy. I actually got this for a gift and loved it so much I kept it.
customer_reviews.author: TAW229Top Contributor: Soap Making

customer_reviews.title: This plates are pretty to use as appetizer plates or for small dessert ...
customer_reviews.text: This plates are pretty to use as appetizer plates or for small dessert plates. The quality is great and they haven’t chipped yet.
customer_reviews.author: Anna P

customer_reviews.title: Very lovely. Will order again.
customer_reviews.text: These are very high quality. I might order some more. Very lovely.
customer_reviews.author: marlena stone

customer_reviews.title: Even prettier in person.
customer_reviews.text: These plates are so pretty and seem very sturdy so far. I was a little worried about tjat but they have a nice heft and despite my clumsiness are still in good shape. The flowers and butterflies are beautifully painted and the colors are vivid.
customer_reviews.author: Tamsen Verstynen

customer_reviews.title: Love the design
customer_reviews.text: Love this pattern. These bowls were exactly what I wanted, Three different size are handy for different uses.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Annette M. Cremo

customer_reviews.title: Made in Indonesia
customer_reviews.text: I received the package today and I like the set so far. Everything is in great condition. It would be good for casual using. Not too bright colors that I actually love.
customer_reviews.author: iii

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set as buying 6 of the smaller plates would have cost me 2/3 of this set price if I'd found them on sale. Love this pattern.
customer_reviews.author: bluewindharper

customer_reviews.title: ... have had one set of these for years and love them. I finally was able to add this ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had one set of these for years and love them. I finally was able to add this set to the first to have a full service for 12.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Underwood

customer_reviews.title: My guesses like them
customer_reviews.text: My guesses who visited us all liked them. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie W.

customer_reviews.title: Square plate compliments this pattern!
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing an entire set, I saw the square accent plate and bought them as a lovely salad or dessert plate. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Doc Paul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and functional for fruit and something else! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Geliya

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like...
customer_reviews.text: ...if you like butterflies and flowers and don't mind them on your dishware. They look better in real life than the photos do justice to. I am really happy with them, each one is different, and good quality. Very sweet. I don't like the standard ultra-feminine styles of dishes, especially the kind you'd find at a tea room - hate them, really - but these are unique, and the art work is well done.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Bellum

customer_reviews.title: Fun and attractive ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this pattern. I added these plates as I work to accumulate a full set to cover most occasions ...
customer_reviews.author: A. Leblanc

customer_reviews.title: Good quality plates
customer_reviews.text: These plates look very elegant and of high quality. However, the shipping took forever.
customer_reviews.author: Daphane

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Bowl
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. I bought three different bowls from Lenox. All of them are good.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Probably more my fault
customer_reviews.text: But, I expected the bowls to be included with the set instead I just got the dinner and desert plates and coffee/tea mugs/cups.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dessert plates
customer_reviews.text: These dessert plates are the perfect size and they are so beautiful. My girls love them.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these little plates. The set I bought doesn't have saucers in it, so these really come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Rossi

customer_reviews.title: The design is very pretty, but I thought these were bigger
customer_reviews.text: The design is very pretty, but I thought these were bigger. I will keep them because they are so pretty, but they really more of a party or break plate size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and pretty plates !
customer_reviews.text: Bought them when they had a very good deal. They are perfect for breakfast or dessert. The patterns are very pretty and the quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I got this set! Lenox Butterfly is a wonderful set!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love. Almost bought Correlle
customer_reviews.text: Oh!!! I'm in love. Almost bought Correlle. There is no comparison. This is a gorgeous pattern and looks elegant on the table. So happy it's open stock.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Everyday perfect dish. Love
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and I can put in dish washer
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous dish set
customer_reviews.text: Love these beautiful dishes. Light weight, easy to hold and gorgeous shape. Hold up well to washing. Came well packaged and safe. Will treasure them for many years to come. Thrilled with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly in Sunny San Diego🌞

customer_reviews.title: So pretty! A lot smaller than I thought it would ...
customer_reviews.text: So pretty! A lot smaller than I thought it would be. So, I will order some others later. I am collecting all the pieces of this pattern. I just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not worthy a Lenox logo.
customer_reviews.text: These are not what you expected, the color and quality are not worth the Lenox logo. They did not say they were made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lenox Butterfly Meadow
customer_reviews.text: When i received the items, one mug (the Monarch) was broken. I could not return the whole box due to its weight and expensive freight back to america. If only the broken mug is returned, it could have been easier.
customer_reviews.author: lynette pascual

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Set.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are extremely pleased with the design and quality of this Dinnerware Set.
customer_reviews.author: PETER B.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!! Very pretty and Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: This set is beautiful and accents the set of Butterfly Meadow dishes that I already have!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dish
customer_reviews.text: I wish people wouldn't give bad reviews because they don't understand ahead of time the type of dish they are purchasing. Just read the description.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Wright

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Dishes
customer_reviews.text: A purchase you will not regret. Six of everything. All six butterflies. I especially liked how this set came with mugs instead of bowls.
customer_reviews.author: A. S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Dishes
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend of ours. My wife really likes the Lennox Butterfly Meadows dishes and purchased them for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ruberg

customer_reviews.title: lovely dishes
customer_reviews.text: for my Mother in Law, she loves these dishes....it was not the best price ever, but shipped free through prime and got there at once
customer_reviews.author: ricky hanes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect soup and cereal bowl.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to replace one of eight that got broken. Love this pattern and the finish and size is perfect for soups, puddings, and cereal.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Dishware
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this purchase. The dishes are beautiful and washed fine in the dishwasher. I plan to buy another set to make a setting for 8. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these from outside USA in 2018 and they are still not broken yet and it's okay. It was pretty cheap in 2018 and that's why I bought. I am wondering where these pieces were made. If they were made in China or Indonesia, then I won't buy anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Eunji Kim

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE
customer_reviews.text: What can you say ? These bowls as well as the entire Butterfly Meadow by Lenox is so beautiful to look at and feel. I do not see how anyone could give this line anything but 5 stars. I reccommend this entire line. The bowels are perfect for cerel, soup, salad.. they are perfect in size for just about anything. I can't stop looking at them. I hope they are around for a long time.. because I will come back for more.
customer_reviews.author: Rojeania Fuscaldo

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dinnerware set for my daughter as a Christmas present. As I all ready knew, she loved it. The dinnerware was well packaged and arrived well ahead of Christmas. I will buy this set again for my other daughter for her birthday. Great product at a very low price. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Martyaz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and well crafted set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and well crafted set. Perfect sizes of plates. Even bought in addition to this set smaller plates for dessert.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sargsyan

customer_reviews.title: Lenox is the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I love Lenox Butterfly Meadow collection. Excellent quality and looks gorgeous! Party Plates are very useful and I use them many times a day for a small portion of food.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE the Butterfly Meadow Pattern
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE the Butterfly Meadow Pattern. So glad I was able to find the party plates as an addition to my set
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: These dishes are so beautiful!! I just love them. I’ve had a couple of family members asked if I minded if they ordered the same ones. Can’t wait to get more of the pieces to go with it. The pictures don’t do them justice!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Fouch

customer_reviews.title: I like Lenox set
customer_reviews.text: After I bought this set, I found Macy's special with discounted price. :-S But, I like Lenox set.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: pretty
customer_reviews.text: Heavens, these are so pretty. Totally over having dishes that were not microwave or dishwasher safe. and, I wasn't willing to give up "pretty" I use these everyday. And, can't get enough of them.
customer_reviews.author: HerringtonLake

customer_reviews.title: The best flowers I've rec'd
customer_reviews.text: I have talked about getting this China for ages. My hubby got me 2 sets for xmas and matching pieces for valentines. The best flowers I've rec'd. Dishwasher & microwave safe, what could be better?
customer_reviews.author: deejay

customer_reviews.title: Nice bowls
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set of bowls with a beautiful pattern. My wife wanted them to go with the matching dishes she has. They are holding up well in the dish washer. No chips as yet.
customer_reviews.author: Dozier

customer_reviews.title: Happily using all everyday
customer_reviews.text: The wife loves the pattern and dish ware and purchased matching cereal/salad bowls. Happily using all everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Durst

product_meta.title: Lenox 6342794 Butterfly Meadow 18-Piece Dinnerware Set
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Dinnerware Set, 18-PieceAt Lenox, we strive to make the daily moments in your life a bit more special. Inspired by heritage and designed for now, we bring a rich history of craftsmanship to modern day life. We’ve been a part of homes for over 130 years. Each time you buy Lenox, you are buying a versatile and timeless piece crafted with our century-long commitment to quality, artistry and beauty. Whether you’re gathering the family for dinner, grabbing a midnight snack for yourself in front of the TV or having friends over, Lenox is for real moments that last on products that are meant for living. Lively butterflies, dragonflies, and bumblebees buzz about a variety of vibrant flowers on the Butterfly Meadow Dinnerware Set. This trademark design features elegant scalloped edges on durable white ceramic porcelain. This mix-and-match classic is crafted for outstanding freezer-to-oven-to-table performance. This microwave and dishwasher-safe 18-piece set makes for a sizeable enhancement to a dinnerware repertoire.

AMAZON.COM
Emblazoned with a sweet butterfly and wildflower motif, this summery dinnerware pattern is versatile enough to serve everyday meals or stand in for special occasion dining. Perfect for an average family, this set packs six 10-3/4-inch dinner plates, six 9-inch salad plates, and six 12-ounce mugs. Made of fine china, the dinnerware has a beautiful reflective quality to its ivory base color yet is surprisingly durable enough to go from the freezer to the oven to the table without damaging and is also safe for the microwave and dishwasher.

 Based on designs from Lenox artist Louise de Luyer, Butterfly Meadow's dinnerware set mixes and matches a variety of meadow scenes, each featuring a species of butterfly with a different bloom. Among the pictured butterfly varieties, there are colorful Swallowtails, Monarchs, Eastern-Tailed Blues, Orange Sulphers, and even a dragonfly here and there. Avid gardeners will also be able to spot favorite flowers, which range from morning glories to lilacs to tiger lilies. Each scene is a bit different from the next, adding to the charm of this country-style dinnerware. Graceful scalloped and ridged edges on plates and mugs lend an additional feeling of innocence to this pattern. This dinnerware set matches other crystal, flatware, and serving pieces in fine china and sculpted metal within Lenox's Butterfly Meadow collection. --Cristina Vaamonde

What's in the Box
6 dinnerware place settings. Each place setting consists of: dinner plate, salad plate, mug. 18 pieces total.
feature_bullets: Set includes 6 each of dinner plates, salad plates, mugs
Made of fine China for all-occasion use
Mix-and-match butterfly and floral motif; Scalloped edges
Designed to go from freezer to oven to table, microwave- and dishwasher-safe
Coordinates with Butterfly Meadow serveware, crystal, and flatware
